commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Good work everyone!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Thanks. The rest of the contest is going to continue next week.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Out of the nine contests, we have one win and they have two.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I thought we might be able to beat them, but Î¼'s really is incredible.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: It's amazing that Emma actually won.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: *Chuckle* I only won because of Hanayo's rice strategy though.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: I thought an eating contest had nothing to do with school idols, but it was a great competition.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: All right! Nijigasaki should aim to be the biggest eaters in the world!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: No we shouldn't!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: The dance-off was remarkable, too.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I'll never forget Eli's dancing. Not only was it so complete, but everyone watching had a great time, too.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: You danced like a star, Karin! Your score was the exact same as Eli's.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: *Giggle* The audience didn't like mine as much, but thanks, Emma.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (The applause was obviously in Eli's favor. Karin practiced so much after that.)

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I loved how intense Umi and Shizuko's singing was.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I would have loved it more if I won.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: It was fun though.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Umi was so into it while she sang, but was embarrassed as soon as it was over. It was strange.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: After she switched on her performance mode, she became a true school idol.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (We lost the dancing and singing contests, but we still have six more to go!)

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: So it's two to one. We'll be winning all the rest, too.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: It's so fun having these contests with Nijigasaki. Thanks for thinking of this, Nico.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: If it's nine contests, that means everyone gets to do one. You really thought this through, didn't you Nico?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Heh. I know right? Every school idol is the star, after all!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Emma looked like she really enjoyed that bread. I hope we become best friends.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: *Giggle* Makes you want to get lunch together, right?

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Karin's dancing was so intense, and Shizuku's singing was great, too.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: I heard the Nijigasaki High School Idol Club just formed, so that's really impressive.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: We need to be looking sharp, too!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: *Giggle* You seem to be enjoying this, Nozomi.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: We've got to take this seriously as well. They don't seem like the type to be happy if we go easy on them.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: School idols always have to have fun and take things seriously!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: That's right! Plus, we can't show people my top secret documents so easily.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Hmmm?

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Did you write about Î¼'s in that?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Î¼'s really is an amazing school idol group.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Yes. They have so much stage experience. Maybe that's the big difference between us.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: We had good battle after good battle, so we can keep going!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I'd love to win this, but just competing against them is amazing.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Yeah. It's great just going up against them.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Y-Yeah. We look up to them, so I didn't think we'd win anyway.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (That's not what I want to tell everyone!)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hey, I have something to say.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: We may look up to Î¼'s, and I think we're lucky just having the chance to compete against them like this.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: But you know, I feel deep down in my heart that we can win.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I know you're all practicing so hard every day, and that you definitely don't want to lose.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: So, I know it may be reckless, but I want to win this!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Yeah! If we're going to do this, I want to win, too.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Me too!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: That's the spirit.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Everyone, thank you so much! We've built up a lot of experience, and I think we're closing the gap between us and them.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: The next contest is next week, right? We should practice extra hard until then.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Well, I guess I'll have to pull out a big win for all of you!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: We can do it. Rina-chan Board says, "Serious!"

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: We'll tear 'em apart!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Now we have to think of what exactly we're going to practice.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Yeah!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Good, everyone is back in good spirits.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (We look up to Î¼'s, but that won't let us surpass them. We have to focus on winning!)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Let's do our best, everyone!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Yeah!
